title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Skills: ARCS Model-Based Acquisition of Information Literacy Threshold Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% accuracy in identifying and evaluating reliable information sources during mathematical problem-solving.
They apply information literacy threshold concepts (authority, value, context, etc.) to project deliverables for peer evaluation.
Through ARCS model-based activities, learners improve information search self-efficacy by 30% compared to baseline assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
